data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts - Steam Mist Weapon Skin
data.detailed_description:
Approach your foe with all the silence of mist in the night - and look great while doing so! - with the Steam Mist weapon skin. Usable across all gun models, you're certain to leave your enemy feeling mist-ified...

Features:

  • Steam Mist Weapon Skin

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts base game.
